About

insert_emoticon

Launch Design is a group of software enthusiasts who would like to be limited only to their Imagination. At Launch Design We have fun doing the impossible.

code

Launch Design was founded in the early stages of 2015 and since then we have had the privilege to express the passion we have for our work in numerous ways.

Work

Hapihour

This is an application that helps one find the closes Meal deal around them. Think about it!

Little Kidogo VR

This is a content Delivery network for VR/AR Experiences and 360 Video

Afrikaner Apokolips

This is an ultra futuristic Massively Multiplayer VR Game based being developed with CIE Productions.

Story Space VR

This is a tool that content creators can use to do project management during content development.
